basics.name: Šimon Podhajský
basics.label: Senior Data/LLM Generalist
basics.summary: Data and LLM generalist quashing problems with AI, data science and the modern data stack. Formerly a data scientist in a leading neuroscience/ML lab and a data lead at an insurtech startup.

work.name: Pure Storage
work.description: Creating a data platform and enabling a more effective and efficient data science
work.summary: Develop a data platform and LLM-based enablements for the company's data science and analytics teams.
highlights: Create Octillion Signature Maker, a ChatGPT Enterprise 'custom GPT' (and later Autogen-based API) that uses LLM to generate regexes and JSON output within a tightly constrained system
Participate in developing a data platform for the company's data science and analytics teams, using dbt, Terraform, AWS SageMaker, and other tools
Plan a data discovery system based on the semantic layer of the data platform, using dbt and LLMs / Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) to generate SQL queries for stakeholders

work.name: Nano Energies DES
work.description: Flexibility aggregation to make renewable energy tractable
work.summary: Use data science and data engineering on the Development Analytics team to further the mission of grid flexibility aggregation.
highlights: Used mixed-integer programming to optimize the device distribution for regulation energy bids.
Drove efforts to document & validate the production APIs with Sphinx and Pydantic.
Co-designed a data warehouse structure to simultaneously facilitate C-level historical reporting, exploratory analysis, and ML training & development.

work.name: iLife Technologies
work.description: Secondary analytics for an insurtech startup
work.summary: Create an analytics platform for a B2B2C SaaS startup.
highlights: Lead a data team to provide operational analytics, quantitative insights, and business intelligence.
Design an event-tracking plan and an enterprise data warehouse to answer critical analytics questions.
Research, select, and deploy the data stack for business needs (Segment, dbt, Hex, Metabase, Hightouch).
Model the transformation of production data to a Kimball-style data warehouse using dbt/SQL.
Oversee an XGBoost implementation to model customer churn. Implement growth accounting.

work.name: SRI International / CNS Lab
work.description: Data science and data engineering for a neuroscience lab
work.summary: Enabling translational neuroscience, machine learning, and other interdisciplinary research.
highlights: Design and implement an Airflow-based, Docker-using, Kubernetes-ready ETL system for processing incoming neuroimaging data.
Architect and implement a Jupyter-based pipeline for porting twenty years' worth of data from a MS Access database to a longitudinal REDCap project.
Dispatch dataset generation, curation, and analysis requests supporting the lab's grant applications and underpinning 10+ published papers.
Develop new or implement existing logic for feature extraction from raw behavioral data.
Debug, develop, and otherwise maintain Scalable Informatics for Biomedical Imaging Studies (SIBIS), a Python-based platform for uniform processing and data sharing of clinical neuroimaging datasets.
Track any changes in Git and SVN and document functionality in a MediaWiki instance.

volunteer.summary: Educational association furthering the reasoning skills of high schoolers.
highlights: Coached the winning Team Czech Republic across three timezones at the International Public Policy Forum 2012.
Developed a strategy for the Czech Debate Association to increase its membership and better serve its members.
